input.name: _utf8

p.span: By submitting this form, I expressly consent and authorize ACCEL Schools to contact me at the number(s) provided via text or short message service (SMS) as well as by phone, regarding educational matters. I understand that these calls may be generated using automated technology and that message and data rates may apply, for which I will be solely financially responsible.

div.p: Now Enrolling Grades K-8 for the Fall!

div.h1: Welcome To North Metro Flex Academy
div.p: We are a tuition-free, public charter school serving students throughout North St. Paul, Maplewood, Oakdale, East St. Paul, and Stillwater, MN. We are Cognia Accredited. We will be enrolling K-8 for fall 2020-21! Our school is conveniently located on Helen Street, just off of Margaret Street across from North St. Paul City Hall, near the North St. Paul Snowman! North Metro Flex Academy is known for being a school that feels like home and family, and for its exceptional academic results. North Metro Flex Academy is authorized by Novation Education Opportunities (NEO) and is managed by ACCEL Schools, an established network of more than 40 charter schools located throughout the US.

div.p: Now Enrolling for the 2020-21 School Year!
June 5 is the last day of the 19/20 school…

img.span: All Teachers Properly Certified & Licensed All teachers meet the Every Student Succeeds Act (ESSA) requirements: Bachelor’s degree, grade-level teaching license/certificate & ability to demonstrate subject area expertise.
Accredited by Cognia™ For meeting the highest standards of education in ongoing third-party review.

div.span:
Thank you for choosing North Metro Flex Academy
for your child and allowing us to serve your family.
To begin the enrollment process, please click below.
